mapper.insert: insert into t_goods( id, name, des, price, type, picture, status ) values ( NULL , #{name}, #{des}, #{price}, #{type}, #{picture}, #{status} )
mapper.update: update t_goods set name=#{name}, des=#{des}, price=#{price}, type=#{type}, picture=#{picture}, status=#{status} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, des, price, type, picture, status from t_goods where id = #{id}
